rules_text:
When Gensis, Oildrinker Heretic enters the battlefield, creatures you don’t control get -2/-2 until end of turn.
Compleat {3}{B}{B} [i]({3}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a Phyrexian artifact in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
